title: Peter Morgan
summary:
Peter Julian Robin Morgan,  (born 10 April 1963) is a British screenwriter and playwright. He is the playwright behind The Audience and Frost/Nixon and the screenwriter of The Queen (2006), Frost/Nixon (2008), The Damned United (2009), and Rush (2013). Morgan wrote the television films The Deal (2003), Longford (2006), and The Special Relationship (2010). He serves as creator and showrunner of the Netflix series The Crown (2016–present).
In February 2017, Morgan was awarded a British Film Institute Fellowship (BFI).
